name.kanji: ロリ·アイヴァーン

description: Loly Aivirrne (ロリ·アイヴァーン, Rori Aivān) is the 33rd Arrancar[1] in Sōsuke Aizen's army. She and Menoly Mallia served as Aizen's aides. Loly is a young, teenage-looking female Arrancar. She has long, black hair with two pigtails which reach down her back, a slender build, and her visible right eye is pink.

name.kanji: ルピ・アンテノール

description: Luppi Antenor (ルピ・アンテノール, Rupi Antenōru) was the Sexta (6th) Espada in Sōsuke Aizen's army,[2] having temporarily replaced Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez before his death at the latter's hands.[3] He was later resurrected by Mayuri Kurotsuchi and became a member of the Twelfth Division's Corpse Unit.[4] Luppi is a male Arrancar with youthful, but effeminate, features. He possesses short, curly though unevenly cut black hair and lavender eyes. Just above his left eyebrow is a row of three pink stars.

media.alt: Luppi's group arrives in Karakura Town.
Luppi grabs Rangiku with his tentacles.
Grimmjow kills Luppi to regain his rank.
Luppi and his fellow resurrected Arrancar are called out by Mayuri.
Promotional artwork of Luppi's Modified Resurrección in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: How unfortunate for you captain. You don't get to kill me. Don't forget my face because the next time we meet, I'll twist off that tiny head of yours and crush it!
quotes.to: Tōshirō Hitsugaya after being saved by Negación

name.kanji: エミルー・アパッチ

description: Emilou Apacci (エミルー・アパッチ, Emirū Apacchi) is the 54th[1] Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Tier Harribel's three Fracción, collectively known as the Tres Bestias.[2] Apacci is a tomboyish Arrancar with heterochromia: her right eye is ice blue, while her left eye is amber with a blue outline around it. She has black, jaw-length hair, and her mask fragment is on the top of her head with a horn in the middle.

media.alt: Harribel saves Apacci from the Arrancar under Baraggan's control.
Apacci, Sung-Sun, and Mila Rose attack Rangiku and Momo.
Apacci, Mila Rose, and Sung-Sun activate Quimera Parca.
Quilge stands over the defeated Tres Bestias.
Apacci destroys a soldier's head with a backhanded punch.
Promotional artwork of Apacci using Cierva in Bleach: Brave Souls.
The anime version of her lost arm.

quotes.quote: Damn you! How dare you point a sword at Harribel?!
And from the looks of it, you're a Lieutenant. Two Lieutenants, huh. Still might as well be three-on-one.
You've got the nerve to badmouth Harribel, yet you don't even know who we are?! I guess you're ignorant as well as worthless!!

description: Aaroniero Arruruerie (アーロニーロ・アルルエリ, Āronīro Arurueri) is an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and the Noveno (9th) Espada. Aaroniero's face is usually concealed behind an elongated, white mask covered with eight holes. He dons this while in the light and also while around his fellow Espada, as he has grown weary of questions and offhand remarks regarding his appearance.

quotes.quote: Sorry, but I simply can't stand the sunlight, and the sunlight can't make it in here.
If it's about our faces, keep it to yourself. We got tired of hearing people's thoughts about them a very long time ago.

name.kanji: ドンドチャッカ・ビルスタン

description: Dondochakka Birstanne (ドンドチャッカ・ビルスタン, Dondochakka Birusutan)[2] is one of Nel Tu's "brothers" and protectors. Dondochakka has a large, heavyset, but dumpy body with short appendages with small, white hands and feet. He wears a hooded yellow bodysuit which is covered with black polka dots of varying sizes.

media.alt: Renji angrily scolds Dondochakka for attacking him.
Dondochakka is saved by Pesche and Kisuke Urahara.

name.kanji: フィンドール・キャリアス

description: Findorr Calius (フィンドール・キャリアス, Findōru Kyariasu) is the 24th Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Baraggan Louisenbairn's six Fracción. Findorr is a slim male Arrancar. The remnants of his Hollow mask consist of a smooth helmet covering the upper half of his face with yellow eye holes and a row of teeth sewn across his chin like a strap. His Hollow hole is not visible. Findorr's Arrancar outfit vaguely resembles a Spanish soldier.

media.alt: Findorr clashes with Hisagi after reaching lieutenant level.
Findorr is pinned against the wall.
The majority of Findorr's claw is cut off.
Findorr fires numerous Bala from his Zanpakutō.
Promotional artwork of Findorr using his Resurrección, Pinza Aguda, from Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Exacta!
How rude of me. I must confess, I barely thought that you were worth the trouble of telling my own name.
Life is but a series of difficult problems! Whoever finds the greatest number of correct answers earns the right to live on!
No Es Exacta. Sorry, Shinigami. You lose!.

name.kanji: ルドボーン・チェルート

description: Rudbornn Chelute (ルドボーン・チェルート, Rudobōn Cherūto) is the 61st Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army, and the sole member and founder of the Exequias. Unlike most Arrancar, his face is hidden. He is distinguished from the other Exequias with his bull-shaped skull, instead of the typical human-shaped skulls his subordinates wear. He wears a customized uniform, which is a long sleeve jacket with a black line starting at the high collar and curving down to his right hip.

media.alt: Rudbornn and the Exequias cleaning up the fights of the Privaron Espada.
Rudbornn creates a wall of Calaveras to block an attack.

name.kanji: シャルロッテ・クールホーン

description: Charlotte Chuhlhourne (シャルロッテ・クールホーン, Sharurotte Kūruhōn) was the 20th Arrancar[1] in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Baraggan Louisenbairn's six Fracción prior to being killed by Yumichika Ayasegawa and later resurrected by Mayuri Kurotsuchi as a member of the Twelfth Division's Corpse Unit. Charlotte is a large, bulky, and muscular Arrancar. His mannerisms and dress style border on those of a stereotypical drag queen.

media.alt: Charlotte is constricted by the vines.
Charlotte overpowers the Zombified Bambietta Basterbine.
Beautiful Charlotte Chuhlhourne's Final Holy Wonderful Pretty Super Magnum Sexy Sexy Glamourous Cero.
Promotional artwork of a resurrected Charlotte in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: You meet someone for the first time and the first thing you do is call them 'hideous'?! Now, listen! What I find truly hideous in this world is those who judge others by their appearances. Yes, I'm talking about the likes of you.
You're the one who was screaming about breaking my nose!! That emphasis on physical damage is really pissing me off, you ugly whore!
You just keep on shouting

One so hideous as yourself is incapable of even comprehending this beauty upon seeing it. Yes, that makes sense. Very well. I understand. You are forgiven. It is no sin to have no appreciation for beauty. In fact, I find myself beginning to pity you.

It must be terrible for you, having to live with such dulled senses. As such, to put an end to this suffering that is your life is a fitting task for the one more beautiful than any other, that is, myself.
A princess always gets her way. If I say that it is over, then it is over.
Not a single soul will stand witness to the moment your life comes to its end. There is no crueler demise for one who values beauty above all, do you not think?

name.kanji: ウルキオラ・シファー

description: Ulquiorra Cifer (ウルキオラ・シファー, Urukiora Shifā)[2][1] is the Cuatro (4th) Espada in Aizen's army of Arrancar. Ulquiorra is a slender, yet fairly muscular, male Arrancar of average height with a melancholic appearance. He has fairly short, messy black hair, pale white skin, a black upper lip, and green eyes with small slit-shaped pupils, similar to a cat's. Part of his bangs fall between his eyes, and he has distinctively thick eyebrows.

quotes.quote: The fact that you only have two escorts is a bit anticlimactic, but having those annoying walls fixed in place suits me just fine, since rushing a conversation isn't really in my nature.

Do not ask any questions. Do not say anything. You have no rights. What you hold in your hand is the rope to the guillotine above your friends' necks. Nothing more. Understand, girl. This is not a negotiation, it's an order.

What would you have me say? 'Don't worry, I'm sure he's still alive'? Ridiculous. I am not here to comfort you. I don't understand: why are you so fixated on life and death? At any rate, your friends will soon be annihilated. So what if that's one step closer? They should have seen this coming from the start. If they couldn't see it coming, the fault lies in their own foolishness. Laughing them off as a group of idiots would be sufficient. Why can't you do that? If it were me, and my friends entered Hueco Mundo without first gauging their strength, I'd be infuriated by their stupidity.
Even if you rise up a thousand times, there will be no victory for any of you.

Hearts, you say? You Humans are always so quick to speak of such things. As though you carry your hearts in the very palms of your hands. But this eye of mine perceives all. There is nothing that it overlooks. If this eye cannot see a thing, then it does not exist. That is the assumption under which I have always fought. What is this
Do not allow yourself to be shaken. Do not weaken your stance. Open your senses. And do not let your guard down for an instant.

No matter how your appearance and techniques may resemble those of an Arrancar, it is as distant from us as the Earth from the sky. It is an understandable route for humans and Shinigami who wish to obtain power to imitate Hollows. However, it will never allow you to stand upon the same level as Arrancar.
Your words are those of a man who knows not true despair. If you know it not, then allow me to teach you. This is the face of true despair.
quotes.to: Ichigo Kurosaki before entering the Segunda Etapa

quotes.quote: You are a fool, Ichigo Kurosaki. You willingly seek to challenge an opponent so much more powerful than you that it strikes a primal fear into your being. Incomprehensible. If this is the work of the 'heart' that you people speak of, then it is because you possess this 'heart' that you humans bring hurt upon yourself, because you possess this 'heart' that you lose your lives.

The greatest ability that I possess is not my offensive capacity but my regeneration. Unlike other Arrancar, who relinquished most of their capacity for high-speed regeneration in exchange for their massive power, I alone retained the capacity to regenerate any part of my body other than my brain and vital organs in an instant.
I see. So you show no mercy. Just like a true Hollow. I care not. Defeated by you as I stand, my existence holds no further meaning. Do it.
quotes.to: Ichigo Kurosaki before getting shot point blank by his Cero

quotes.quote: Kill me. Make it quick. I no longer have the strength left in me to even walk. If you do not cut me down now, then this will go unsettled for eternity.
I see. So this is it. It lies here within this palm. The heart.
The Cold War Visored Training Patros's Rebellion  Ichigo Kurosaki vs. Ulquiorra Cifer Ichigo Kurosaki vs. Ulquiorra Cifer: Final Fight

name.kanji: ドルドーニ・アレッサンドロ・デル・ソカッチオ
name.romaji: Dorudōni Aressandoro Deru Sokacchio) was Arrancar Cientecimo Tercero (103rd

description: Dordoni Alessandro Del Socaccio (ドルドーニ・アレッサンドロ・デル・ソカッチオ, Dorudōni Aressandoro Deru Sokacchio) was Arrancar Cientecimo Tercero (103rd) in Sōsuke Aizen's army prior to being executed by Rudbornn Chelute and later resurrected by Mayuri Kurotsuchi as a member of the Twelfth Division's Corpse Unit. Dordoni is a tall, muscular man of fair complexion. He has black hair and blue eyes. His hair resembles a pair of small horns, and he has a van-dyke beard and mustache.

media.alt: Dordoni hits Nel with a Bala.
Dordoni attempts to kill Nel to get Ichigo to release his full power.
Dordoni is woken up by Nel's drool.
Promotional artwork of a resurrected Dordoni in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Your feet aren't something you should be going out of your way to confirm with your eyes.
Restraining yourself for the sake of battle, that's important for those who seek strength. I think it's a wonderful thing.
What is there to be angry about? If your objective is to
quotes.to: Ichigo Kurosaki after trying to attack Nel Tu

quotes.quote: But what I'm really ashamed of is not being able to fight you at your full strength! Compared to this, all other shames are nothing, niño.

I wanted to return to the Espada. The Espada are Aizen's loyal servants, and Aizen probably thinks of them as nothing more than tools of war. I know that, but once you've stood at the top, you can never forget the view. That place was indescribably comfortable. I thought that if I beat you at full power, Aizen would once again notice me, and I might be able to return to the Espada. That is why I urged you to Hollowfy, and my feelings haven't changed! Why are you surprised? Healing the wounds of an enemy whose circumstances you don't even know means that you're prepared for a counterattack! Am I wrong?
quotes.to: Ichigo Kurosaki after being healed by him

quotes.quote: Injuries are in the mind, niño. If the will to fight is healed, then injuries to the body are of no consequence.

Those who dwell here are like me and have no naivety. Do not hesitate to cut your foe. Do not think twice about dealing the final blow. And do not even think about healing the enemy's wounds. Leave the chocolate here. Become a demon, niño. Become strong like a demon. Become crafty like a demon. You must realize that there is no way to withstand ruthlessness other than by becoming ruthless. If you don't, niño...

name.kanji: アズギアロ・イーバーン

description: Asguiaro Ebern (アズギアロ・イーバーン, Azugiaro Ībān) is an Arrancar soldier in service to the Wandenreich. Ebern is a tall and slender male Arrancar. He has short red hair which is swept back, creating peaks at either side of his head. His mask fragment covers his left eye, and has three holes across its surface.[3][4] His right eyebrow unusually points upwards.

media.alt: Ebern attempts to steal Ichigo's Bankai with his Medallion.
Promotional art of Ebern in Bleach: Brave Souls.

name.kanji: リューダース・フリーゲン

description: Luders Friegen (リューダース・フリーゲン, Ryūdāsu Furīgen) is an Arrancar[1] soldier in service to the Wandenreich. Luders' attire consists of a long, white robe, over which he wears a waist-length white robe which feature a white hood with black face mask and epaulettes. A thin black sash goes from the left epaulette to the right side of his waist. He wears white boots. His eyebrows and hair are black and long on the right while white, kept short, and braided on the left.

media.alt: Luders and six other Wandenreich members confront Yamamoto.
Luders is killed before Ebern's eyes.

name.kanji: ノイトラ・ジルガ
name.romaji: Noitora Jiruga; Viz: Nnoitora Gilga) is an Arrancar and the Quinto (5th

description: Nnoitra Gilga (ノイトラ・ジルガ, Noitora Jiruga; Viz: Nnoitora Gilga) is an Arrancar and the Quinto (5th) Espada in Sōsuke Aizen's army. Nnoitra is a very tall man with a thin and lanky body. His face is frequently set in a huge smile which reveals his upper teeth. His black hair hangs past his shoulders, concealing the left side of his face and a large white eyepatch with one exposed dark gray eye.

media.alt: Nnoitra once laying waste to a colony of Hollows.
Nnoitra speaking to Nelliel after she rescued him.
Nnoitra lounges during the Espada meeting.
Nnoitra taunts Ulquiorra about looking after Orihime.
Nnoitra breaking Ichigo's arm, prompting Nel's true form to emerge.
Nnoitra appears to be stabbed through the head and still alive.
Nnoitra is hit by Zaraki's kendō attack.
Nnoitra as he dies the death he always wanted.
Nnoitra about to shoot his golden Cero from the tip of his tongue
Promotional artwork of Nnoitra in Bleach: Brave Souls.
Censorship between the manga and anime.

quotes.quote: If I kill a thousand nobodies, who's gonna admit that I'm the strongest? There's no value in taking a nobody's life.
There is not a single person in heaven or on earth that can break me. Don't forget that I am the strongest Espada.

This is a battle. Of course it's gonna be unfair. That which is called 'battle' was a monster originally born of unfairness and intolerance. I can't stand that guy. I can beat that guy. I can't forgive that guy. We make enemies for all sorts of reasons, and from the moment you make an enemy, until one of you draws his last breath - you're in a battle.
We've only been separated for a little while, but it looks like you've got annoying in a totally different way. You're just pathetic.
Ya know, I hate idiots who keep on comin' at ya even though there's no way they're gonna win.
I just can't freakin' stand it. On the battlefield, a woman standin' above the men. That's all it is.
quotes.to: When asked why he hates Nelliel Tu Odelschwanck

quotes.quote: Hah! What the hell're you blathering about?! Dodgin' attacks is a pure battle instinct! And there ain't nowhere you can cut me! That sword of yours can never cut me! That's all there is to it!
Every fuckin' one of 'em, they have the gall to take pity on me. And they don't even know how much they're hurtin' me by doin' it. I don't do
Oh, I've got purpose all right. I fight for the sake of fighting.
I want to die in the heat of battle. That's why I wanna get stronger. The stronger I get, the more battle will surround me. I want to be able to live and breathe the heat of battle.

Ain't no chance of salvation for us. Never has been. With or without Aizen, that's never gonna change. If there's one thing I'm grateful to that guy for, it's the fact that he gave me power. Thanks to that I've been able to savor greater battles than ever before. I'm gonna be strong. Stronger than anyone. If I'm gonna fight the ultimate enemy, then there can't be anyone else stronger than me. I'll take 'em all out. No matter what it takes.
I wanna be cut so that my breath is gone before my body hits the ground. That's the kind of death I wanna have.

Kenpachi Zaraki vs. Nnoitra Gilga Nelliel Tu Odelschwanck vs. Nnoitra Gilga Ichigo Kurosaki vs. Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez: Final Fight Yasutora Sado vs. Gantenbainne Mosqueda Enter The Home of Hollows Invasion of Hueco Mundo Visored Training

name.kanji: リリネット・ジンジャーバック

description: Lilynette Gingerbuck (リリネット・ジンジャーバック, Ririnetto Jinjābakku)[3] is an Arrancar and Coyote Starrk's sole Fracción,[2] as well as a part of the same Hollow entity: when he uses his Resurrección, the two become one. Lilynette is a young-looking female Arrancar. Her outfit consists of white-colored briefs with a black line positioned in the middle, arm-warmers, a revealing vest with a high collar and thigh-high, fur-lined boots. Her Hollow hole is positioned in the center of her stomach.

media.alt: Lilynette and Coyote Starrk wander through Hueco Mundo.
Sōsuke Aizen encounters Starrk and Lilynette for the first time.

quotes.quote: I won't stop tickling you until you wake up.
Listen! Arrancar don't have ages!
That hurt! What're you gonna do if my head splits open, moron?
Ow, Ow, ow, that's my ass! You know damn well that's my ass, you bastard!
What're you just layin' around for? Isn't this a battle of revenge? How pathetic!

You're such a moron, Starrk! You're the Primera, have some sense of your position! And you've just been putting up a front and haven't even tried to take this seriously!! Why do you think that Aizen made you number one?! Because he believes in your power, right!? If you don't want to lose any of your comrades then the only thing to do is fight!!!
Shunsui Kyōraku vs. Coyote Starrk: Final Fight Shunsui Kyōraku & Jūshirō Ukitake vs. Coyote Starrk Jūshirō Ukitake vs. Lilynette Gingerbuck The Armies Assemble: Battle at Fake Karakura Town

name.kanji: ザエルアポロ・グランツ, Zaeruaporo Gurantsu) was an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and the Octava (8th) Espada. He is the younger brother of Yylfordt Granz.[2] After being killed by Mayuri Kurotsuchi[3], Szayelaporro was dragged down to Hell where he became a Jailer of Hell (地獄の獄吏
name.romaji: Jigoku no Gokuri; Viz "Gallows of Hell"

description: Szayelaporro Granz (ザエルアポロ・グランツ, Zaeruaporo Gurantsu) was an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and the Octava (8th) Espada. He is the younger brother of Yylfordt Granz.[2] After being killed by Mayuri Kurotsuchi[3], Szayelaporro was dragged down to Hell where he became a Jailer of Hell (地獄の獄吏, Jigoku no Gokuri; Viz "Gallows of Hell").[4] Szayelaporro is a tall and thin male Arrancar.

quotes.quote: First a Bankai user, then a Quincy! I have such good luck! If I were Yammy, I would probably be on the verge of shouting suerte!
quotes.to: About Renji Abarai and Uryū Ishida

quotes.quote: For inferior beings like you to irritate me to this extent and even force me to fight you at my full strength... Now, THAT is what I would call a 'bad joke'.

My, my. Just by teasing you a little, just by surprising you a little, you become blind to all but that which lies before your eyes. Everybody is the same in that respect. Just like children. Humans, Shinigami, and yes, even Quincy. They are all just as inferior. If you want to know what reason Aizen-sama could have for destroying you all... why, that 'inferiority' itself is your sin.

Do you understand what I am telling you? Using this ability, I am able to impregnate myself into my enemies, and thus I can be ever reborn into a new body. Just as the Phoenix, the immortal bird, engulfs itself in flames once it reaches old age and is reborn, its life begun anew, from the midst of those flames. Do you realize now? Immortality. This is its most absolute form. One does not attempt to escape death, but accepts it as one's due, and allows life's cycle to continue, not allowing that death to bring an end to one's own existence. Eternally repeating that cycle of death and rebirth, an existence such as this... truly, mine is what may be called a 'perfect existence'! For one such as me, the concept of 'death' as an end to life simply holds no meaning. You may kill me, but in defiance of the finality of death, I will simply arise once more. Now do you understand? It is impossible for you to truly kill me. As such, you have no means to achieve victory in this battle.
Mayuri Kurotsuchi vs. Szayelaporro Granz Renji Abarai & Uryū Ishida vs. Szayelaporro Granz Invasion of Hueco Mundo Enter The Home of Hollows

name.kanji: イールフォルト・グランツ

description: Yylfordt Granz (イールフォルト・グランツ, Īruforuto Gurantsu) is Arrancar Quince (15) in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez's five Fracción. He is the older brother of Szayelaporro Granz, the 8th Espada.[2] Yylfordt has long blond hair and red eyes. The remains of his Hollow mask sit atop his head, vaguely resembling a broken helmet. In addition, he wears the standard Arrancar uniform, which is unzipped, revealing enough to show his Hollow in the center of his chest.

media.alt: Yylfordt and his companions arrive in Karakura Town.
Ururu attacks Yylfordt in Genocide Mode.
Yylfordt Granz in his released state.

name.kanji: ナキーム・グリンディーナ

description: Nakeem Grindina (ナキーム・グリンディーナ, Nakīmu Gurindīna) is Arrancar Catorce (14) in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez's five Fracción. Nakeem is a large, fat Arrancar who always takes a hunched position with his hands crossed on his back. His face is round and wide and he has small, brown eyes. His hair is dark brown and has a bowl hairstyle. He wears the standard Arrancar uniform, a tight jacket and a belt leading a Zanpakutō in his waist.

name.kanji: ペッシェ・ガティーシェ

description: Pesche Guatiche (ペッシェ・ガティーシェ, Pesshe Gatīshe)[2] is one of Nel Tu's "brothers" and protectors. Pesche Guatiche is a humanoid Arrancar whose head is almost completely covered by his mask, which resembles an insect-like head with large mandibles and horns. His large left eye, yellow in color, is visible through an eyehole on the front of his mask. However, his right eye is concealed by a purple eye patch, which is attached to his brow.

media.alt: Pesche's guess of how strong the group is, with Uryū at the bottom.
Szayelaporro creates a carbon copy of Pesche.
Ichigo tries to keep Nel and Pesche quiet.
Infinite Slick fired from Pesche's mouth.

quotes.quote: There's only one path left for us to take now! Nel-sama... Nelliel Tu Odelschwanck-sama is dead. With her mask broken, robbed of her powers and memories lost, the person before us is no longer Nel-sama! Therefore... we shall protect her... from Nnoitra, from Szayelaporro, from pain, from hardship, and from every kind of calamity; we will protect this Nel-sama, who has become so frail, with our very lives! That is our final duty, as Hollow destined to serve Nel-sama!

name.kanji: ティア・ハリベル
name.romaji: Tia Hariberu; Viz: Tier Halibel) is an Arrancar and the former Tres (3rd

description: Tier Harribel (ティア・ハリベル, Tia Hariberu; Viz: Tier Halibel) is an Arrancar and the former Tres (3rd) Espada in Sōsuke Aizen's army until the latter's defeat. Sometime after Aizen's defeat, she becomes the de facto ruler of Hueco Mundo.[2][3] Harribel is a tall female Arrancar of curvaceous and well-endowed frame. She has olive skin, aqua green eyes, thick eyelashes, and short golden blonde hair; which she usually keeps messy with three braided locks.

media.alt: Harribel's face when covered by her jacket.
Harribel as a Vasto Lorde-class Menos.
Sōsuke Aizen saves Harribel from the Hammerhead Arrancar.
Harribel and her Fracción watch Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez and Ichigo Kurosaki fight.
Harribel reveals her mask remnants and Espada tattoo.
Harribel is freed from Hitsugaya's ice obelisk.
Harribel is captured by the Wandenreich.
Harribel's Fracción from left to right: Sung-Sun, Mila Rose, and Apacci.
Promotional art of Harribel in her Resurrección from Bleach: Brave Souls.
The first version of Harribel in her Resurrección.
An alternate-universe Harribel from the Cacao Society.
Harribel's unique form in Bleach: Brave Souls.
Harribel's mask fragments in the manga.
Harribel's mask fragments in the anime.

quotes.quote: Don't worry about it. This is the battle of an Espada in his Resurrección form. It's not unreasonable for you to be frightened. That's your primal fear. Value it.
quotes.to: Emilou Apacci, Franceska Mila Rose, and Cyan Sung-Sun

quotes.quote: However, is the one he's fighting truly Human? I'd never think that this volume, concentration and catastrophic nature of his Reiatsu would be that of a Human's. It seems more like I'm watching a fight between two Espada.
quotes.to: About Ichigo Kurosaki and Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez's battle

quotes.quote: How underwhelming. So this is all a captain amounts to.
You stood no chance. With the bite of a shark, a dragon of ice shall sink beneath the waves.
You are next. I will avenge my subordinates.
If my water can become your own weapon, then the moment you realized this, you should also have considered the opposite possibility. That is the way of battle.

Our existence is built upon the noble sacrifices made. Instead, you fall in battle from trying to protect your subordinates. My subordinates were not simply defeated. They left behind markers for me, on how to carry on the fight. If I had lost, my subordinates' sacrifices would have all been for nothing. I hold within me the resolve of those who sacrificed their lives.
We women are easy prey for the males. I brought you here because I thought that it would be better if we worked in a group, rather than working alone.
quotes.reference: 9.0 9.1 9.2 9.3 9.4 9.5 9.6 9.7 Bleach anime; Episode 284, only takes place in the anime.

quotes.quote: I don't want to become stronger through the power I gain by killing and sacrificing another. If I can't win alone, then I'll win as a group.
quotes.reference: 9.0 9.1 9.2 9.3 9.4 9.5 9.6 9.7 Bleach anime; Episode 284, only takes place in the anime.

quotes.quote: No world is without sacrifices. But if we produce casualties, we would also sustain casualties of our own.
quotes.to: Emilou Apacci, Franceska Mila Rose, and Cyan Sung-Sun
quotes.reference: 9.0 9.1 9.2 9.3 9.4 9.5 9.6 9.7 Bleach anime; Episode 284, only takes place in the anime.

name.kanji: グリムジョー・ジャガージャック
name.romaji: Gurimujō Jagājakku)[2] is an Arrancar and was the Sexta (6th

description: Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez (グリムジョー・ジャガージャック, Gurimujō Jagājakku)[2] is an Arrancar and was the Sexta (6th) Espada in Sōsuke Aizen's affiliated army.[3] Grimmjow is a tall, muscular man with light blue spiky hair and light blue eyes, the latter including green lines below them, similar to the eye markings on the Panthera genus of cats. Grimmjow's attire consists of a white hakama, a black sash and a ragged white jacket with an upturned collar.

media.alt: Grimmjow hurries off in search of his rival.
Grimmjow appears before Ichigo and Rukia.
Grimmjow blocking Ichigo's Zanpakutō with his bare hands.
Grimmjow with his arm cut off by Kaname Tōsen.
Grimmjow surprised to see Ichigo donning a Hollow mask.
Grimmjow trapped within ice beside Ichigo and Rukia.
Grimmjow's battle is stopped by Ulquiorra.
Orihime Inoue restores Grimmjow's arm to demonstrate her powers.
Grimmjow appears before the three girls.
Ichigo with his Hollow mask fighting Grimmjow in his released state.
Grimmjow is attacked and incapacitated by Nnoitra.
Grimmjow arrives at the Soul King Palace.
Grimmjow's Resurrección form, damaged during his battle with Ichigo.
Grimmjow on the cover of "B" Station.
Grimmjow's Desgarrón attack in Soul Resurrección.
Grimmjow's new outfit in Brave Souls
Grimmjow's unique form in Bleach: Brave Souls.
An alternate-universe version of Grimmjow from the Cacao Society.
An alternate-universe Grimmjow from the Spirit Society.

quotes.quote: I don't care who they are, if they show even a bit of Reiatsu, we just kill them all.

You underestimating me, Shinigami? I still don't quite feel like killing you, yet. Get a grip and come on! Show me your Bankai. If you don't, I'll do the same thing I did to that little Shinigami over there and put a freakin' hole in you!
I threw it away before I got here, 'cause I won't need two arms to kill you.
quotes.to: Ichigo Kurosaki when asked what happened to his arm

quotes.quote: Damn right. Who you are has nothing to do with killing you!
It's best to crush insects quickly once they've gotten inside, right?
They're all cowards, every damn one of them. Whatever. I'll just consume them. As they become my flesh and blood, they will see beyond. I... I am the king!

Those eyes. You're always like that. No matter how much I beat you up, you've got this sense about you that you're going to beat me. You think you're freaking stronger than me! I can't freakin' stand it!
Whether you're a Human, or a Shinigami or an Arrancar, anyone who looks at me like they're underestimating my power, I'll smash every one of 'em into oblivion!
Shut the hell up. Enough with the screamin' kid. Next time you make a fuss, I'm gonna blast you into next week!
I'll show him what you get when you mess around with someone else's prey.

You are a Shinigami and I am a Hollow! Whichever side loses will be annihilated. That's how it's always been for thousands of years. Do you need any other reason to fight? Come on. The one who remains standing will return alive. That's all it comes down to!
Like I'd lose... like I'd... there's no way... no way I'd lose to someone like you!

name.kanji: シャウロン・クーファン

description: Shawlong Koufang (シャウロン・クーファン, Shauron Kūfan) is the Undécimo (11th) Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army. He was a member, and apparently the leader, of Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez's five Fracción. His position as the 11th Arrancar before his death implies that he was the oldest living Números. Shawlong Koufang has a long face with grey eyes and black hair, which is braided and usually hanging over his shoulder.

media.alt: Shawlong gets attacked by Hitsugaya's tail.

quotes.quote: He is an enemy. Even if there is no value in killing him, there is certainly no value in letting him live.
The Tenth Division captain. Magnificent news for me. This means I've hit the jackpot.

When your Bankai disappears, killing you will be too easy. Saying how weak you are would be rude to you, a captain. While you remain in that form at least let me defeat you with my greatest fighting ability.

Join hands with us, Grimmjow. But I won't just leave it at that. We have no intention of remaining as Adjuchas or Gillians. We are definitely going to rise to become Vasto Lordes. And in order to do that, we need strength. And that enormous strength to pull us forward can be none other than you. Let us go together, Grimmjow. You shall become our king.

name.kanji: クッカプーロ

description: Kukkapūro (クッカプーロ, Kukkapūro) is a Números in Sōsuke Aizen's army, holding the number 35,[1] and a former companion of Yammy Llargo. Kukkapūro resembles a puppy with a Hollow mask. He is covered with soft, white fur, and his mask has large eye sockets and two small horns protruding above his long, drooping ears.[2] He has the number 35 tattooed on his back.

name.kanji: テスラ·リンドクルツ

description: Tesra Lindocruz (テスラ·リンドクルツ, Tesura Rindokurutsu; Viz: Tesla Lindocruz) is the 50th Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army[1] and Nnoitra Gilga's only Fracción. Tesra is a slim, male Arrancar with dirty blonde hair. He has a turquoise marking on his right cheek and wears an eyepatch over his brown right eye. Tesra also wears a different style jacket from most Arrancar in that it resembles a lab coat, with the sleeves rolled up to his elbows and what appears to be medals sewn across his chest.

media.alt: Badly wounded Tesra sheds a tear for his fallen master.

name.kanji: エドラド・リオネス

description: Edrad Liones (エドラド・リオネス, Edorado Rionesu) is Arrancar Trece (13) in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez's five Fracción. Edrad is a very large muscular Arrancar, with brown eyes and long black hair, with the left side shaved and red. The remains of his Hollow mask are merely the eye holes, which rest on his nose, giving the appearance of glasses. Edrad wears a standard Arrancar uniform, with his jacket usually open, revealing the Hollow hole on his chest.

media.alt: Edrad Liones (far right) and his group meeting Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez for the first time.
Ikkaku reveals his Bankai to Edrad.
Promotional artwork of Edrad using his Resurrección in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Me? I'm Arrancar Trece... Well, wait. Any more than that and it'd be wasteful. Just know me as the one who will rip you apart.
Such a ludicrous and painful way to fight. It's full of holes and you always stand a good chance of being hit. I'd be terribly unlucky to be slain by all this.
quotes.to: Thinking about Ikkaku Madarame's fighting style

quotes.quote: I don't know why, but it seems that you made a mistake. It doesn't matter who releases their sword first. The outcome of this battle won't change because of that. Ah, here you are foolishly boasting of your own prowess. Instead, you should be cowering in fear before the enemy that will render your bones to dust. Everything you do will be in vain. Let me show you how an Arrancar enjoys fighting.
Well now, you have already resigned yourself. Among soldiers, that is a virtue. You fought admirably, fighting until you were completely spent and broken. So regrettable.
Ikkaku... Madarame was it? I am glad I asked.

name.kanji: ヤミー・リヤルゴ, Yamī Riyarugo) is an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army. He holds the rank of Arrancar Diez (10)

description: Yammy Llargo (ヤミー・リヤルゴ, Yamī Riyarugo) is an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army. He holds the rank of Arrancar Diez (10), but becomes the Cero (0) Espada after releasing his Zanpakutō. By far the largest of the current Espada, Yammy is a giant Arrancar with tan skin, a powerful build, and a ridge-lined cranium. He has brown eyes, black hair, long, bushy sideburns, and a thin ponytail reaching his upper-back. Aside from this, he is bald. He has orange eyebrows, and red markings under his eyes.

media.alt: Yammy breaks free of the ice Tōshirō Hitsugaya encased him in.
Yammy senses that Ulquiorra has died.
Ichigo slams Yammy down with a Getsuga Tenshō.
Yammy takes on Byakuya Kuchiki and Kenpachi Zaraki.
Yammy's evolved Resurrección after his rage peaks.
Promotional artwork of Yammy in Bleach: Brave Souls.
Yammy's unique form in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: I came here a few times with a mask on, but the Human World is more boring than I remember! The spiritual energy here is so thin, I think I'm going to suffocate!
What should I do, Ulquiorra? This one knows some strange tricks. Should I tear off her limbs and bring the rest back to Aizen-sama?
And there I was thinkin' I'd go help the bastard out some more once I'd crushed these worms! I can hardly help him if he's got himself killed...

Tch. It just ain't nearly enough. I've slept my ass off, eaten my ass off, saved up a whole load of Reiatsu. Just killing off a bunch of nobodies like these punks ain't nearly gonna be enough to use it up!!!
quotes.to: Rukia Kuchiki, Yasutora Sado, and Renji Abarai

quotes.quote: What are your dumbasses blabbering on about down there?! You think you're gonna take ME out?! Little pieces of trash like you?! Don't make me laugh.
quotes.to: Rukia Kuchiki, Yasutora Sado, and Renji Abarai

quotes.quote: What's that look on your face for? Take a good look at my number. It's a zero. I'm the Cero Espada, Yammy Llargo. Ain't one of the Espada you've fought up until now that's stronger than me. Grimmjow, Nnoitra, an' Ulquiorra too. As far as I'm concerned, they're all just trash!!
Fury is the root of my power...! Now... Piss me off more, and more, and more! The more you do, the more pathetic your final deaths will be!!

name.kanji: バラガン・ルイゼンバーン
name.romaji: Baragan Ruizenbān) is an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and the Segunda (2nd

description: Baraggan Louisenbairn (バラガン・ルイゼンバーン, Baragan Ruizenbān) is an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and the Segunda (2nd) Espada. Prior to this, Baraggan ruled Las Noches as the God-King of Hueco Mundo. Baraggan has the appearance of an elderly man, with a left olive green eye, a white mustache and white hair. His face is lined by large scars on the left side of his chin that goes down to his neck and across his right eye.

media.alt: Baraggan dedicates last moments in an attack directed towards Aizen.
Baraggan as the God-King of Hueco Mundo and original ruler of Las Noches.
Baraggan sits on his throne, surrounded by his Fracción.
Baraggan breaks a part of his throne when Poww is defeated.
Baraggan after being hit by Suì-Fēng's Bankai.
Baraggan is attacked inside the Kidō cage.
Promotional artwork of Baraggan using Arrogante in Bleach: Brave Souls.
Baraggan's unique form in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Until the Boss gets out of there, I'll be giving the orders round here. Anyone got a problem with that?

Kill them. Do not allow even a single one of these ants to escape with his life. If you lose here, there will be no place for you to return to. Do not disappoint me. Do not force me to walk a path not stained with the blood of my enemies. Say it! Who do you serve?

You seem to be having difficulty grasping the nature of the ability I possess. Each of the Espada holds dominion over a different form of death. The ten different paths that can lead a human to death. This is reflected in their individual abilities, their ideologies, and forms the basis of their existence. Isolation. Sacrifice. Emptiness. Despair. Destruction. Intoxication. Insanity. Avarice. Rage. And the form of death over which I hold dominion is 'age'. 'Age', that is to say, 'time'. The greatest, and most absolute form. The death that inevitably awaits all things.
Incomprehensible. That is the nature of death. Furthermore, from this point onward, until this battle is over, everything that happens will be beyond the comprehension of your wits.
Hmph. It would appear you have nothing left to entertain me with, no matter how much I let you run about. Time to put an end to this.
It matters not who you are or what manner of power you may possess. Before the power I wield, all beings are equal. Come. It is time that you too were reduced to naught but bones.

I suppose 'buying time' in the face of one who holds dominion over 'age' is a similar action to spitting in the face of God. Perhaps I should congratulate you on your nerve, lesser beings though you are.
To think that you could injure me to such an extent... I will never forgive you, impudent insects! Regret your boundless insolence as you turn to dust before me!

Insects, insects, insects! Shinigami, humans, Hollows, Arrancar, all of their differences and strife, will, freedom, beasts, plants, the moon and stars and sun - all of it is meaningless! There is but one absolute in this world, and that is my power! Everything outside of that is as tiny and meaningless as an insect! It is only natural for I, wielder of the ultimate power over all, to hold dominion over the world!! Among a number of competing powers, equality can never be found. But observe! In these hollow eyes of mine, the lives you bear are no greater than those of mere ants!
How tedious this all is. There is nothing more meaningless than an army with no enemy to fend off. Do you not agree? My subjects. Though, little point asking when none of you would dare but concur.
I was just beginning to succumb to boredom. Had you not appeared here today, I might have divided my own army in two and had them slaughter among themselves.
quotes.to: Sōsuke Aizen, Gin Ichimaru, and Kaname Tōsen

quotes.quote: I will kill you. Kill you with my own hands. You will regret ever granting me this power. I am King. I am God. I am undying. I will never cease in my attempts to take your life, Sōsuke Aizen.
The Armies Assemble: Battle at Fake Karakura Town Suì-Fēng & Marechiyo Ōmaeda vs. Baraggan Louisenbairn Hachigen Ushōda & Suì-Fēng vs. Baraggan Louisenbairn

name.kanji: ルミーナ, Rumīna) and Verona (ベローナ

description: Lumina (ルミーナ, Rumīna) and Verona (ベローナ, Berōna) are two of Szayelaporro Granz's Fracción. They are two very short, obese Arrancar who are almost identical in appearance, except for their hairstyle: Verona has a short black pony tail, while Lumina has black pigtails. Lumina and Verona are almost identical in not just appearance, but their personalities as well. They are both very energetic Arrancar, and have a habit of repeating things that they have already stated.

quotes.quote: Aaroniero is dead!
Lumina! Lumina! Lumina!

name.kanji: ガンテンバイン・モスケーダ

description: Gantenbainne Mosqueda (ガンテンバイン・モスケーダ, Gantenbain Mosukēda) is the 107th Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army. He has brown eyes and a big burnt orange afro-style haircut with thick sideburns and a goatee. His outfit has been modified to match his particular style, including large frills on his collar and thighs. The remains of his Hollow mask are a sunglasses-shaped plate on his forehead with four teeth coming out above each eye.

media.alt: Promotional artwork of Gantenbainne in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: There's no way the techniques of a Human who can't even use Sonído could ever reach me!
Get up Yasutora Sado. I know that you are still hiding some power. You're very strong, that's no way for a guy like you to fight. In the name of God, let us have a fair fight.
You're not going to respond? That breaks my heart.

name.kanji: メノリ•マリア

description: Menoly Mallia (メノリ•マリア, Menori Maria) is the 34th Arrancar[1] in Sōsuke Aizen's army. She and Loly Aivirrne served as Aizen's aides. Menoly is a teenage-looking female Arrancar with tomboyish features. She has short, slicked blonde hair with a slight fringe over her right eye. In addition, Menoly has green eyes. Her Hollow mask is positioned around her right eye, completely obscuring it from view, with teeth dotted around the bottom. The location of her Hollow hole is unknown.

media.alt: An enraged Menoly attacks Grimmjow after he hits Loly.
Menoly and Loly object to leaving Orihime with Aizen.
Menoly creates a Cero to scare Orihime.
The wall behind Menoly is destroyed.
Menoly reluctantly follows Loly into the tower.
Menoly wants to drop Loly's plan.
Ulquiorra prevents Ichigo from helping Orihime.
Menoly thinks attacking Orihime is pointless.
Quilge attacks Menoly after she and Loly reveal themselves.
Menoly being resurrected in the manga and anime.

name.kanji: ワンダーワイス・マルジェラ

description: Wonderweiss Margela (ワンダーワイス・マルジェラ, Wandāwaisu Marujera) is the 77th Arrancar[1] in Sōsuke Aizen's army and the only modified Arrancar under Aizen's command. Though not an Espada, the Soul Society ranks his Spiritual Energy in the same class as theirs.[2] Wonderweiss has a thin and somewhat childlike body. He has light blond hair, parted to one side, with the tips fanning out from his face. The remains of his Hollow mask consist of a three-point tiara on the top of his head.

media.alt: Wonderweiss' giddy expression after stabbing Ukitake
Wonderweiss after his birth via the Hōgyoku.
Wonderweiss is struck by Yamamoto's Sōkotsu technique.
Wonderweiss seals the flames of Ryūjin Jakka.
Promotional artwork of Wonderweiss and his Resurrección, Extinguir, in Bleach: Brave Souls.

name.kanji: メダゼピ

description: Medazeppi (メダゼピ, Medazepi) was one of Szayelaporro Granz's Fracción and an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army. Medazeppi was much larger than any of Szayelaporro's other Fracción, with disproportionately long arms. He has clown-like black hair protruding from each side of his head and the remnants of his Hollow mask cover his right eye and nose with teeth coming out of the bottom. His left eye is completely yellow and he has a dark pink stigma as an eyebrow.

name.kanji: ネリエル・トゥ・オーデルシュヴァンク, Nerieru Tu Ōderushuvanku)[1] is an Arrancar and the former Tres (three) Espada. She was also known as Nel Tu (ネル・トゥ

description: Nelliel Tu Odelschwanck (ネリエル・トゥ・オーデルシュヴァンク, Nerieru Tu Ōderushuvanku)[1] is an Arrancar and the former Tres (three) Espada. She was also known as Nel Tu (ネル・トゥ, Neru Tu) when she was small, good-natured, and childlike. Nelliel lives in Hueco Mundo with her adoptive brothers and former Fracción, Dondochakka Birstanne and Pesche Guatiche, and their pet, Bawabawa. Nelliel is a female Arrancar who has hazel eyes and green hair.

media.alt: An example of Nel's childish affection for Ichigo.
Nelliel during her time as the 3rd Espada.
Nelliel's body transformed into a child's.
Nel Tu is chased in a game of "eternal pursuit".
Ichigo, with Nel Tu on his back, encounters Dordoni.
Nel watches an unconscious Ichigo after his fight with Ulquiorra Cifer.
Nelliel suddenly becomes a child again.
Nel explaining the Tres Bestias to Ichigo.
Nel is shocked by Quilge's defeat of the Tres Bestias.
Nelliel appears in her adult form.
Nelliel prepares to rescue her allies from Askin Nakk Le Vaar's Gift Bereich.
Nel and her Fracción during their super sentai-style intro.
Promotional art of Nelliel's new outfit in Bleach: Brave Souls.
Nelliel in her original adult form.
Nelliel's unique form in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Yep! Nel's a serious maso-kiss, so it no fun if I don't cry a lil!

Itsygo's out dere fightin' for you! Why're ya acting like yer afraid of Itysgo? Din't you say Itsygo's a nice person?! Well yer right! Nel tinks he's nice too! Itsygo's so nice, when he heard Ulquiorra say yer name, he charged right at 'im! Itsygo is a human! But den he became a Shinigami, an' even put on dat mask and used dat dangerous power! Dere's no way Itsygo isn't gettin' hurt! He's gotta be sufferin'! But Itsygo's usin' his powers and gettin' injured all cuz he's fightin' for you! What's-- What's gonna happen if ya don't cheer for Itsygo?!
There was a time when we ceased to be Human and became beasts. And then in becoming Arrancar, we regained our capacity for reason. One who possesses reason should require a reason to fight.
You are a beast. I cannot accept you as a warrior. I have no desire to be burdened with the life of one who is no warrior.
Carrying a weapon on your shoulder is threatening behavior. If you truly wish to appear strong, hide your weapon as you walk.
This isn't a reason to fight! But you hurt people who were very dear to me! And you're going to pay for it!
If you're going to pick a fight in the middle of a conflict, do so elsewhere. At any rate, I fail to see what gives you, the Sexta, any right to order me, the Tres, around.

name: Roka Paramia
description: Roka Paramia (ロカ・パラミア) is an Arrancar and a nurse in Sōsuke Aizen's affiliated army. Roka is a rather slim individual with medium length black hair and grey eyes. Her mask fragments take the form of half a skull covering the right half of her face. She wears a long green striped dress with a turtle neck, and black boots.[1][2] Doing her duties as a nurse in Las Noches, Roka reattaches Yammy Llargo's severed arm.

First Appearance.novel: Bleach: Spirits Are Forever With You

media.alt: Promotional artwork of Roka in her Resurrección in Bleach: Brave Souls.

name.kanji: チーノン・ポウ

description: Choe Neng Poww (チーノン・ポウ, Chīnon Pō) is the 25th[1] Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Baraggan Louisenbairn's six Fracción. Poww is a very tall Arrancar with light green eyes and dark brown hair. His Hollow hole is not visible, but his mask remnants consist of a large plate across his chin with two horn-like appendages. He has two green, triangle-like lines running through each of his cheeks which form inner circles. He has the hairstyle of a medieval monk.

media.alt: Poww stands over his defeated opponent, Ikkaku Madarame.
Poww is slain by Komamura's Bankai.

quotes.quote: I see. Then I have no issue. For my God, my king, understands better than any other that between the two of us, there can be no contest.
This little baldy seemed to still be hiding some of his power, but it seems he went and died all the same.
Oh, how nice. If you're still alive, then show me it. Your hidden power. Now. Do as I say. Or you'll die.
Not half bad, Shinigami. Or are you a dog? Either way, that was a decent punch. Still, that's not what I call a REAL punch!
So heavy. So tired. But I suppose it can't be helped. These are Baraggan-sama's ORDERS!!

name.kanji: ニルゲ・パルドゥック

description: Nirgge Parduoc in "FEAR FOR FIGHT"You know, I'd much rather be fighting that blonde lady over there than you. I don't give a crap about some stupid little fatso. Nirgge Parduoc (ニルゲ・パルドゥック, Niruge Parudukku) is the 27th[1] Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Baraggan Louisenbairn's six Fracción. Nirgge is a very large Arrancar whose Hollow mask remnants consist of a thick helmet with short tusks protruding from the sides.

media.alt: Promotional artwork of Nirgge using his Resurrección, Mamut, from Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: You know, I'd much rather be fighting that blonde lady over there than you. I don't give a crap about some stupid little fatso.
Didn't you know? You should never judge people on their outer appearances.

name.kanji: アビラマ・レッダー

description: Abirama Redder (アビラマ・レッダー, Abirama Reddā) is the 22nd[1] Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Baraggan Louisenbairn's six Fracción. Unlike other Arrancar, Abirama does not wear a jacket, leaving the numerous red tattoos across his chest exposed. He wears two white sleeves on his wrists, a white hakama, a white breechcloth, and a black sash around his waist. He has long black hair, and the remains of his Hollow mask takes the form of a beak-like helmet atop his head.

media.alt: Abirama's Devorar Pluma used in his Devorar Erupcion form.
Promotional artwork of Abirama using his Resurrección, Águila, from Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Raaaaaaaaaaaaghhhhhhh! I'm gonna do you in! I'm gonna do you in!!

Third Division? The hell... you're Gin Ichimaru's man, huh? Oh, I see. I'd heard how he just left you behind in Soul Society, but I get it now. Who the hell wouldn't want to leave behind a useless piece of shit like-
Ain't that just dandy. That's the kind of face I like to see. That's what I call a fightin' face.
You finished already? Now, that's just no good, Izuru Kira! But then, I guess, faced with my Águila, it's only natural.
Playing tricks on me, huh? That's pretty dirty. And you call yourself a true warrior?!

name.kanji: ディ・ロイ・リンカー, Di Roi Rinkā) is Arrancar Dieciséis (16) in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez's five Fracción. What remains of his Hollow mask is a bulky helmet similar in shape to a hammerhead shark. The right-hand side of his mask is wrapped in cyan bandages
name.romaji: which obscures his right eye (the bandages are meant to hide an injury given to him by Grimmjow when he was still an Adjuchas

description: Di Roy Rinker (ディ・ロイ・リンカー, Di Roi Rinkā) is Arrancar Dieciséis (16) in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez's five Fracción. What remains of his Hollow mask is a bulky helmet similar in shape to a hammerhead shark. The right-hand side of his mask is wrapped in cyan bandages, which obscures his right eye (the bandages are meant to hide an injury given to him by Grimmjow when he was still an Adjuchas). When the bandages are unwrapped, there is a gash on the top of his mask.

media.alt: Di Roy as a member of Grimmjow's pack.
Di Roy Rinker watches as Grand Fisher has his mask removed.
Di Roy faces off against Ichigo.
Di Roy blocking Rukia's blade with his hand.
Rukia uses her Shikai against Di Roy.

name.kanji: フランチェスカ・ミラ・ローズ

description: Franceska Mila Rose (フランチェスカ・ミラ・ローズ, Furanchesuka Mira Rōzu) is the 55th[1] Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Tier Harribel's three Fracción, collectively known as the Tres Bestias.[2] Mila Rose is a tall, dark-skinned, green-eyed Arrancar with long, thick, wavy brown hair and large breasts. Her Hollow hole is positioned mid-way between her navel and breasts. Her mask fragments form a three-sectioned crown around her head and a thick necklace.

media.alt: Mila Rose as an Adjuchas-class Menos.
Mila Rose and Sung-Sun are introduced to Apacci.
Mila Rose, Apacci, and Sung-Sun activate Quimera Parca.
Mila Rose is defeated by Yamamoto.
Quilge stands over the defeated Tres Bestias.
Promotional artwork of Mila Rose using Leona in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Who's scared?! You're the one whose teeth are chattering so loud that I can hear them from all the way over here, Apacci!
She's provoking you. There's no point getting all worked up over it.
Don't get too carried away there, Apacci. Else I'll murder you.

Ichigo Kurosaki vs. Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez: Final Fight The Armies Assemble: Battle at Fake Karakura Town Rangiku Matsumoto and Momo Hinamori vs. Emilou Apacci, Franceska Mila Rose, and Cyan Sung-Sun Battle of the Chimera: Gotei 13 vs. Ayon Wandenreich vs. The Arrancar Ichigo Kurosaki & Ayon vs. Quilge Opie

name.kanji: ゾマリ・ルルー, Zomari Rurū) is an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army

description: Zommari Rureaux in "KING OF THE KILL"Everything is 'governed' by its rightful master. Subordinates act under the orders of their superiors. The masses live under the rule of their king. The clouds move according to the will of the wind. The moonlight is ruled by the light of the sun. Zommari Rureaux (ゾマリ・ルルー, Zomari Rurū) is an Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army, and the Séptima (7th) Espada. Zommari is a tall, muscular, dark-skinned Arrancar with noticeably large lips.

media.alt: Zommari receives the broadcast of Aaroniero's death while meditating.
Zommari using his Gemelos Sonído against Byakuya.
Zommari attempts to take control of Byakuya's Bankai, Senbonzakura Kageyoshi.
Zommari's unique form in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Of all the Espada, I have the fastest Sonído. And by timing my steps carefully, I am able to create an apparent 'clone' of myself. Well, it's essentially just a little magic trick. Magic tricks exist for the purpose of surprising the opponent. For you to be surprised because you could not follow the trick with your eyes...that is nothing to be ashamed of.
The reason for your defeat is that very pride which led you not to so much as give your name.
What's that? Proud? Now, why would you say that? You are my enemy, but you are a captain. I have aimed to consider you an equal, and to treat you as such. There is no pride in my heart.
It would appear that arrogance is simply in your nature. I accept that. And so from this point onward, I shall smash that insolence deep into the very recesses of your being.

Everything is 'governed' by its rightful master. Subordinates act under the orders of their superiors. The masses live under the rule of their king. The clouds move according to the will of the wind. The moonlight is ruled by the light of the sun.

You throw away your left leg and left arm without hesitation. You instantly regard that which is stolen from you as an enemy, and thus you attack, even if that means cutting your own body. How very impressive. To be able to make such cool-headed decisions in such a situation. However, that determination, from my point of view, seems a little careless. The only limbs you now retain are your right arm and right leg. You intend to fight against an Espada such as myself with only one arm and one leg? Now, that is a little presumptuous, don't you agree?
What is this I see in your eyes? You will not forgive me? You intend to swing that blade? You intend to judge me?! Is that what you call pride?!

You Shinigami cut us down as though it were simply the natural way of things! Do you truly think yourself gods?! Who exactly gave you the right to cut down the Hollows?! Is it because we feed upon the humans?! Why, then who gave you the right to protect those humans?! Nay! Nobody has granted you the right to undertake any of this!! You Shinigami label us as evil, and thoughtlessly slice us down purely because in your arrogance, you fancy yourselves to be the purveyors of some great 'justice' of your own making!
Byakuya Kuchiki vs. Zommari Rureaux Enter The Home of Hollows Invasion of Hueco Mundo

name.kanji: チルッチ・サンダーウィッチ

description: Cirucci Sanderwicci (チルッチ・サンダーウィッチ, Chirutchi Sandāwitchi) was the 105th Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and a Privaron Espada prior to being executed by Rudbornn Chelute and later resurrected by Mayuri Kurotsuchi as a member of the Twelfth Division's Corpse Unit. Her appearance is similar to that of the Gothic lolita style of Japanese fashion. She has short purple hair, purple eyes, black fingernails, light purple lipstick, and a light purple teardrop marking on each cheek.

media.alt: Cirucci together with the other Arrancar resurrected by Mayuri Kurotsuchi.
Cirucci after removing Golondrina's wings and arms.
Promotional artwork of Cirucci in Bleach: Brave Souls.
Cirucci resurrected as a zombie in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Would you mind not attacking me while I'm in the middle of saying something? Jeez, you have no manners, do you, four eyes?!
Arrancar are warriors, and the Espada are their leaders. We are born to kill the enemy and win. There is no such thing as an acceptable loss!

name.kanji: コヨーテ・スターク
name.romaji: Koyōte Sutāku) is an Arrancar and the Primera (1st

description: Coyote Starrk (コヨーテ・スターク, Koyōte Sutāku) is an Arrancar and the Primera (1st) Espada in Sōsuke Aizen's army, along with his other half, Lilynette Gingerbuck. Starrk has blue-gray eyes and wavy, dark brown hair, which ends at the base of his neck, is always unkempt, and is parted down the middle. He has a faded goatee. His clothing is typical of an Arrancar: he wears a white jacket outlined in black, though altered with the collar upturned.

media.alt: Starrk having to be awakened after Aaroniero's death
Starrk meets Lilynette for the first time after they split.
Sōsuke Aizen encounters Starrk and Lilynette for the first time.
Starrk present during the Espada meeting.
Starrk and Lilynette are confronted by Shunsui Kyōraku and Jūshirō Ukitake.
Starrk in his Resurrección, Los Lobos.
Starrk attempts to force Shunsui to use his Bankai.
Starrk shoots Shunsui from behind with a Cero at point-blank range.
Starrk produces two swords through Colmillo.
Promotional artwork of Starrk using Los Lobos in Bleach: Brave Souls.
An alternate-universe Starrk from the Cacao Society.

quotes.quote: What do you want me to do about it?
quotes.to: Lilynette Gingerbuck after hearing about Aaroniero Arruruerie's death

quotes.quote: Sorry about this. To be honest, it's a pain for me too.
quotes.to: Orihime Inoue before taking her back to Sōsuke Aizen

quotes.quote: The two of us are one and the same. Whilst when other Hollows became Arrancar, their Hollow powers separated into the form of 'body' and 'blade', we separated into two separate bodies. It is when we are reunited that our power is truly released.
I've gone to the trouble of pulling out this damn release. I'm going to see your Bankai if I have to drag it out of you.

Like I said, this ain't my thing. Let's just forget it. It's not like Aizen-sama feels like lending us a hand either. Those guys are strong. I get that already. No point fighting when it's just gonna mean more dying. So can we just go home and sleep now?
Ready to give it up? If you run, I'll let you go.
I see. Nothing for it, then. Not that I'm too fond of the idea, but I'll have to finish you off.

Why do I have to fight with a strong guy like this? I always envied the weak. Whenever we made friends, their souls would waste away just from being near us. Because we were so alone, we split our soul in two. I don't know which was our original form. Or perhaps, it was neither. But this was the only way we had to escape from our isolation. I so envied the weak. The weak can always find others to be around. I want to be weak. And if that's impossible, I at least want to find companions who are as strong as I.
I'm not alone. I'm not alone. I'm not alone any more...

name.kanji: シアン・スンスン

description: Cyan Sung-Sun (シアン・スンスン, Shian Sunsun) is the 56th Arrancar[1] in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Tier Harribel's three Fracción, collectively known as the Tres Bestias.[2] Sung-Sun is a slender female Arrancar with long, flowing, olive-green hair, long eyelashes, and lavender eyes, with three pink dots just below her right eye. Her mask remnants create three hair clip-like extensions on the right side of her bangs. She wears a furry black necklace around her neck.

media.alt: Sung-Sun and Mila Rose are introduced to Apacci.
Sung-Sun fires her dark pink Cero.
Sung-Sun, Apacci, and Mila Rose activate Quimera Parca.
Promotional artwork of Sung-Sun using Anaconda in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: Would you please stop bickering, both of you. When you raise your voices like that, it only makes you look weak.
quotes.to: Emilou Apacci and Franceska Mila Rose

quotes.quote: Please stop this, you two. You are only making fools of yourselves. If you are distracted by her words, you play straight into her hands. You cannot help your low intelligence, but could you at least try not to cause me too much trouble?
quotes.to: Emilou Apacci and Franceska Mila Rose

quotes.quote: An interesting idea. I too was just thinking that having the two of you around would only hold me back.
quotes.to: Emilou Apacci and Franceska Mila Rose

quotes.quote: As you can see, my two primate companions seem to be busy with their own little argument, so I will take care of you myself, Mr. Captain.

Ichigo Kurosaki vs. Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez: Final Fight The Armies Assemble: Battle at Fake Karakura Town Rangiku Matsumoto and Momo Hinamori vs. Emilou Apacci, Franceska Mila Rose, and Cyan Sung-Sun Battle of the Chimera: Gotei 13 vs. Ayon Wandenreich vs. The Arrancar Ichigo Kurosaki & Ayon vs. Quilge Opie

name.kanji: ジオ＝ヴェガ

description: Ggio Vega (ジオ＝ヴェガ, Jio Vega) is the 26th Arrancar in Sōsuke Aizen's army and one of Baraggan Louisenbairn's six Fracción. Ggio is a slim, male Arrancar with scruffy black hair, a short braided ponytail, golden eyes, and a youthful, feminine face. The remnants of his Hollow mask resemble the skull of a saber-tooth cat, and are on the top of his head, resembling a helmet. His Hollow hole is not visible.

media.alt: Promotional artwork of Ggio in his Resurrección, Tigre Estoque, in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: You're pretty damn gullible, aren't ya! If that weapon of yours really can take me out in two hits, then you should have used your Shunpo and ended this the moment you'd got me trapped! That's what I would've done.

From the symbol on your haori, you must be the Second Division Captain, yes? The Onmitsukidō, huh. I guess that makes you like a team of assassination specialists, but for all that, you're pretty slow with your blade. Is this really the kind of fighting that Soul Society would call 'assassination'?
And so our positions are reversed, Ms. Second Division Captain. Come to think of it, I've told you my name, but I haven't had the chance to ask yours. Ah, well. Who cares, anyway.
You've 'caught' me? Just who do you think you're talking to? Now vanish.
Don't screw with me! You're the one who's underestimating MY power here!! If anyone's gonna be showing their true strength, it's me!

name.kanji: アイスリンガー·ウェルナール

description: Aisslinger Wernarr (アイスリンガー·ウェルナール, Aisuringā Werunāru), is the 17th Arrancar[1] in Sōsuke Aizen's army, and one of the gatekeepers of Las Noches.[2] Aisslinger is an Arrancar who abandoned his Human form for greater power.[3] He has four arms which each contain extending fingers that he uses to shoot his blasts of energy. His Hollow mask is in the shape of a beak, and leaves only the upper-left quarter of his face visible.

quotes.quote: But you're saying that I, Aisslinger, have a 'lower power of reasoning?' I could never overlook such a comment.

You're wrong...this room was designed like this. We are the guards of this place. We expel those who would pass through here and break into Las Noches. If we should fall, so shall this room. Remember this Humans... those are the kinds of opponents you are going up against. There is no end to this fight and there is no victory ahead of you.
Aizen-sama fears nothing. It is for that reason that we gather before him. To we who are born from fear, the path of the man who has no fear is as dazzling as a moonbeam.

name.kanji: アルデゴル

description: Aldegor (アルデゴル, Arudegoru) is an Arrancar who sides with Patros in his plan to dethrone Sōsuke Aizen.[1] Aldegor is a tall and bulky Arrancar. He has black spiked up hair, teal eyes, and his outfit consists of the standard Arrancar blouse and his Hollow mask remnant is a skull with a bull-like horn that covers the upper-left quarter of his face. Aldegor is bullish and arrogant, though not sadistic like his partner Menis.

name: Cloning Arrancar
description: An unnamed Cloning Arrancar that attacks Karakura Town during the time that Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya was sent to protect it. In his Hollow form, the Cloning Arrancar bears a resemblance to an armadillo. He has a brown fur covering his back while his legs are a light purple with a ring of brown near the feet. His Hollow mask has a large mouth with no other features present on it. The mask extends over his spine with spike protruding from it every few inches.

media.alt: A horde of clones created by this Arrancar.

name: Hammerhead Arrancar
description: The Hammerhead Arrancar was once a Hollow in Baraggan Louisenbairn's army and was later turned into an Arrancar and joined Sōsuke Aizen's Arrancar army. As a Hollow, he was quite large and bulky, making Tier Harribel look very small in comparison. His body was a dull purple with a white neck. His head sprouted out like that of a hammerhead shark and he had two rows of 8 teeth with no eyes on his head. He had two gills on each side of his chest as well as fins for arms and two bulky legs.

media.alt: The Hammerhead Arrancar as a Hollow.
The Hammerhead Hollow falls to the ground after being struck by Harribel.
Aizen stops the Hammerhead Arrancar's attack.

name.kanji: メニス

description: Menis (メニス, Menisu) is an Arrancar who sides with Patros in his plan to dethrone Sōsuke Aizen.[1] Menis is a youthful, effeminate Arrancar. He has spiked red hair with the end in a braid and amber eyes, his outfit consists of a sleeveless blouse that exposes his mid-drift, and his sash hangs below his left hip. What remains of his Hollow mask is a jaw which rests on the upper-left side of his head, His Hollow Hole is in the center of his chest.
